ðŸ“– Summary: The wayland-bongocat repository provides a Wayland-native overlay that displays an animated bongo cat reacting to keyboard input. It's designed for streamers and content creators to add a fun visual element to their desktop. Key features include real-time animation, hot-reload configuration, dynamic device detection, and optimized performance.
